EmailTemplate.name: 10 UPDATE Notify Contact-Lead of Corian database Registration- ENGLISH
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
You recently requested for your contact details to be deleted from the Corian® database.
In order to retain your Corian® registration, could you please reply to this email confirming that we can keep your contact details on the Corian® Database.
Please be assured that your will not receive any mailings from us and we will keep your contact details private.
If we do not hear from you within 7 working days, we shall delete all your details, as requested.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Username}
